item.title: BEGAE 182
item.description: What do you understand by the term ‘non-verbal communication’ (150 words) In our day-to-day life, a substantial portion of our communication is in the form of non-verbal communication. There are various types of non-verbal communication which broadly can be classified in to 9 categories. For example, Facial expressions: a smile or a frown can convey various types of emotions to the audience and thus forms a perfect type of non-verbal communication.
